name: Larry Hogan
summary: Popular Republican Governor of Maryland who never voted for Trump, called him 'unhinged,' and wrote in Ronald Reagan rather than support Trump in 2024.

keyStatements.quote: Donald Trump is an unhinged lunatic who is not fit to be president of the United States.
I think Donald Trump is a disaster for the Republican Party and for the country.
I've never voted for Donald Trump and I certainly won't start now.

timeline.significance: Elected as Republican in blue state
Won by large margin despite Trump

timeline.event: Wrote in Ronald Reagan for president

credibility.background: Popular two-term Republican Governor of Democratic-leaning Maryland, businessman

oppositionReasons: Trump is not fit to be president
Trump is a disaster for the Republican Party and country
Trump lacks the character for the office
endorsement: Has never voted for Trump; wrote in Ronald Reagan in 2024

sources.title: List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
